LionRiderTours.overview: Accommodation & Meals   Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost   Day Accommodation Meals   1-2       Samburu Simba Lodge     Mid-range lodge bordering Samburu NR without fences   Day 1: Lunch & Dinner Included      Day 2: All Meals Included                   +4 Photos          +3 Photos          Day 1: Lunch & Dinner Included Day 2: All Meals Included     3       The Ark     Mid-range lodge inside Aberdare NP     All Meals Included                   +8 Photos          +7 Photos              All Meals Included       4       Lake Nakuru Lodge     Mid-range lodge inside Lake Nakuru NP     All Meals Included                   +10 Photos          +9 Photos              All Meals Included       5-6       Simba Oryx Nature Camp     Mid-range tented camp just outside Masai Mara NR   Day 5: Lunch & Dinner Included      Day 6: All Meals Included                   +2 Photos               Day 5: Lunch & Dinner Included Day 6: All Meals Included     7      End of tour(No accommodation)      Breakfast Included           Breakfast Included
LionRiderTours.inclusions: Excluded  International flights (From/to home) Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour Tips (Tipping guideline US$10.00 pp per day) Personal items (Souvenirs, travel insurance, visa fees, etc.) Government imposed increase of taxes and/or park fees Some meals (As specified in the day-by-day section) Drinks
LionRiderTours.gettingthere: Getting There         This tour starts and ends in Nairobi          This operator can book your international flights help          Fly to/from Jomo Kenyatta Airport (NBO- Check price) in Nairobi          A transfer from and back to the airport is included          Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost
